meanings.definition: enzymes that break down cell walls
meanings.sent1: The autolysins in the cell wall help to break it down for recycling.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying how autolysins can be used to break down tough cell walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous autolysins decided to break down the cell wall during the cell's nap time.
meanings.sent4: The autolysins worked tirelessly, like tiny demolition experts, breaking down the cell wall.
meanings.sent5: The autolysins, like tiny wrecking balls, demolished the cell wall with precision.

meanings.sent1: Autolysins are important proteins that break down cellular components for recycling.
meanings.sent2: The body uses autolysins to degrade old cellular components and make room for new ones.
meanings.sent3: The autolysins threw a party inside the cell, degrading all the cellular components for fun.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny janitors, autolysins diligently degrade cellular components to keep the cell clean.
meanings.sent5: The autolysins worked like little recycling machines, degrading cellular components efficiently.

meanings.definition: substances that cause self-digestion in cells
meanings.sent1: Certain autolysins can trigger self-digestion in cells under specific conditions.
meanings.sent2: The presence of autolysins can lead to self-digestion within the cell.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous autolysins played a prank on the cell, causing self-digestion to occur.
meanings.sent4: Autolysins act like internal triggers, causing self-digestion within the cell.
meanings.sent5: The autolysins were like secret agents, silently causing self-digestion within the cell.
